first-section.description: Hey there! I'm Justine, a curious mind exploring the world of coding, reading and the art of pixels. I'm proud to have a unique background that combines spoken languages and coding languages! On here you will be able to follow my progress whether in programming or pixel challenges!

almofus.short-desc: A tool designed to help you in the dofus almanax quests
almofus.long-desc: Almofus is a tool designed to help you keep track of the almanax daily quests. With it, you can keep track of which almanax quests you've already completed and which ones you haven't, which also comes in handy when wanting to complete the 1600 quests success of the game!

almofus.general: Almofus is a tool designed to help you keep track of the almanax daily quests. With it, you can keep track of which almanax quests you've already completed and which ones you haven't, which also comes in handy when wanting to complete the 1600 quests success of the game! Its creation rooted in the frustration of most MMORPG, coming back to the game after a long pause and having no idea where you stopped and having no real method to track this in-game.
